description.text:
At nth level, a blood hunter can denote a target as his quarry as part of declaring his favored target. If he dismisses the effects of his quarry as a free action, he can select a new quarry after 1 hour. If his quarry dies, he can select a new quarry after 10 minutes have passed.
At 19th level, if his quarry is killed or dismissed, he can select a new one after 1 minute has passed.
